General.Name: R.E.A. Holdings plc
General.Description: R.E.A. Holdings plc engages in the cultivation of oil palms in the province of East Kalimantan in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, the Cultivation of Oil Palms, and Stone and Coal Interests. The company also produces and sells crude palm oil and crude palm kernel oil in its agricultural land allocations comprising approximately 64,522 hectares. In addition, it is involved in stone quarrying and coal mining activities; and generation of renewable energy from its methane capture plants. Further, the company holds interests in stone deposits and coal mining concessions located in East Kalimantan. R.E.A. Holdings plc was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Tennyson House, London, United Kingdom, W1W 5PA
